channel.title: 317 random event to stop autoclickers?
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I searched up if there was a way to make a random event to stop auto clickers on my 317, but I only found a tutorial for 508 servers.
Is there a way I can just add the magic lamp interface from runescape that tells them to click a certain button or something?
Or not just the Magic Lamp, but anything...
Thanks

okay, how can I do that?

item.title: 317 random event to stop autoclickers?

item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“suppyscape, post:4, topic:403187”]^ yeah I don’t exactly know where to put that…[/quote]It’s very simple, just copy it and paste it underneath other public voids.

[quote=“Davidi2, post:3, topic:403187”]That has no input validation at all though…[/quote]Lol yeah, you’re right. I think he should just make them randomly move a few steps back and a few steps right.

item.title: 317 random event to stop autoclickers?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

This is for Deltascape sources:

Method

public void triggerRandom() { if (!randomed) { random_skill = misc.random(statName.length) - 1; if (random_skill < 0) random_skill = 0; sendQuest("Click the @or1@" + statName[random_skill] + " @yel@button", 2810); sendQuest("", 2811); sendQuest("", 2831); randomed = true; showInterface(2808); } }

String

public String statName[] = { "attack", "defence", "strength", "hitpoints", "range", "prayer", "magic", "cooking", "woodcutting", "fletching", "fishing", "firemaking", "crafting", "smithing", "mining", "herblore", "agility", "thieving", "slayer", "farming", "runecrafting"};

You choose where you want to call the method to stop the autoing. And you might get some errors, but they aren’t hard to fix. You just need to add in a few things. Tell me if you get a “can not find symbol” or something like that. It means you didn’t declare something. Post the code, too.

Read full topic
